page.title: 19Communications
page.content: The postal service is efficient. Van deliveries from the local sorting offices at Carnforth and Milnthorpe cover the area. A free local newspaper is delivered. Local Council meetings are reported on notice boards. Church organisations produce their own Parish megazines. Coming Events are announced by posters on trees, gates, fences and poles. In this area of small, friendly villages, much information is transmitted by word of mouth, frequently by casually meeting people whilst shopping. In such a rural area telephones are invaluable both in emergencies and for social contacts. The authorities endeavour to provide services as unobtrusively as possible in this area of high quality landscape.
